greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: a(n) = gcd(prime(n) - 1, prime(n+1) - 1).
link: Michael De Vlieger, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10000
mathematica: Table[GCD[# - 1, NextPrime@ # - 1] &@ Prime@ n, {n, 102}] (* _Michael De Vlieger_, Dec 31 2016 *)
results.author: _Labos Elemer_, Dec 06 2000
ext: Offset corrected to 1 by _Michel Marcus_, Dec 11 2013
